description: This file defines an asynchronous function generateSOWFromPrompt for a lightweight AI client that interacts with a local backend API to generate a Statement of Work (SOW) content from a prompt. It manages HTTP requests, handles responses, and provides error handling for the generation process.

methods.name: generateSOWFromPrompt(promptText)
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a SOW draft from a given prompt by calling the local backend API, handling success and error responses appropriately.
